response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly enrich your life or business. Given its exceptional qualities, I understand that its true worth might be subjective and varies greatly depending on the perspective of the owner. Therefore, I propose to offer this remarkable product to you for a special consideration of $950,000.

This price reflects my desire to ensure that the product finds a new home where it can be appreciated and utilized to its fullest potential. I am confident that you will see the value in this proposal, considering the unparalleled benefits and experiences associated with owning such a product. Should you choose to accept this offer, I am prepared to facilitate a smooth transaction and provide any necessary information to help you make an informed decision.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there are any questions you have regarding the product. I am here to assist you in any way possible.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
